sub_title: Global Client Executive Partner @ Eviden | Aviation | Digital Transformation | MBA
summary:
As a Global Client Executive Partner at Eviden and a Chief Commercial Officer at Digital and Beyond, I have over 25 years of experience in sales and business development, delivering business growth and driving digital transformation programs across multiple industries that include aviation, travel and transportation. I have contributed over US$525M of TCV and built strong industry networks through developing strategic partnerships at the highest levels.

My core competencies include general management, business services, and sales leadership, resulting in successful business outcomes. I am deeply knowledgeable across various industries, such as Airlines, Aviation, Travel, Transportation, Airports, Air Freight, Ocean Freight, Automotive, and supply chain. I leverage the latest technologies such as cloud platforms, AI, Blockchain, and IoT to deliver innovative solutions that enhance customer experiences, operations, and profitability. I am passionate about bringing together top talent, best practices, and the latest technologies to drive business success and create value for my clients and stakeholders.

treasury_media.title: IATA ADS 2018 - Air Cargo Rules & Regulations Compliance
treasury_media.description: Enforcing the case for Artificial Intelligence within the Air Cargo industry . The deck outlines a use case in aviation with focus on Watson Air Cargo Compliance, and see how AI technology is used to determine air cargo compliance by performing real time cargo declaration checks safely and securely based on industry rules & regulations manuals, carrier policies and local import/export legislation knowledge.

treasury_media.title: Dustrupting the supply chain.pdf
treasury_media.description:
Blockchain in Air Cargo: Digital Disruption in the Supply Chain

To solve challenges in the air cargo supply chain industry, early adopters have set off their blockchain journey by building new ecosystems.

profile_positions.title: Global Client Executive Partner, Travel & Transportation

profile_positions.description:
Founder & Managing Director - Digital & Beyond connects people, technology, and business processes to boost customer experiences and business values. They specialize in developing cutting-edge capabilities to drive digital transformation using advanced technologies like cloud, mobility, Blockchain, AI, and analytics. They tackle industry-specific problems across various sectors such as automotive, transportation,, manufacturing and supply chain logistics.

Digital & Beyond co-founded AdValure, a start-up that uses IoT to digitize enterprises. AdValure is a cloud-based IoT data hub that processes real-time data generated by sensors, actuators, and internet-connected devices. Its proprietary data model and API connectors allow intelligent devices and data services to connect and share data seamlessly. AdValure currently serves the automotive and mobility industry and plans to extend its capabilities to other sectors.

The launched platform has demonstrated its efficacy in delivering insights that enhance fleet performance and customer experience. Fleet owners can track and monitor their fleet's performance, improve driver behavior, reduce vehicle downtime, and enhance the overall customer experience using vehicle telemetry data.

My Key Responsibilities:
•	Creating businesses that drive innovation and create business value across industries
•	Leveraging collective learnings, best practices, and experiences to deliver exceptional results
•	Strategic planning and team leadership
•	Customer-centric approach
•	Leveraging technology to drive digital transformation and create new opportunities for businesses
•	Developing the partner network
profile_positions.title: Chief Commercial Officer

profile_positions.description: Re-joined Accenture to lead the Freight & Logistics Software Applications, Products and Platforms Sales, Business Development and Advisory practice globally
profile_positions.title: Global Sales & Industry Leader, Travel, Aviation, Freight & Logistics

profile_positions.description:
I worked as the Senior Vice President of Travel, Transportation, and Logistics CEMEA at Teleperformance & DIBS (Intelinet). In this role, I took full ownership of the Teleperformance industry vertical and was accountable for winning new accounts and growing the vertical in the CEMEA region. My key responsibilities included developing and executing a cross-regional CEMEA business development plan strategy to drive measurable results and support the overall success of the new business development team.

Together with the regional leadership, I co-created and executed Teleperformance's Travel & Transportation sales plan. I also integrated DIBS into the sales offering and value proposition to combine customer experience enabled by BPO/BPM. As a result, I was able to develop a pipeline of €132M Euro based on 3-year contract value. Notable clients I engaged during my tenure include Finnair, Trivago, TUI, and Turkish Airlines Cargo.

My core skills include strategic planning, business development, cross-functional collaboration, and customer experience management in the Travel, Transportation, and Logistics industry. I'm proud of my impactful achievements, which demonstrate my ability to drive measurable results and grow businesses in a highly competitive market.
profile_positions.title: Senior Vice President Business Development EMEA
Global Trade Digitization Sales Leader EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for driving business growth across IBM's Global Travel & Transportation Practice in Europe, reporting to the Global Managing Director and Senior Vice President. My key responsibilities included developing and executing the T&T growth strategy and go-to-market approach, leading major digital transformational deals with major clients across EMEA, and setting up and leading the Global Blockchain Travel & Transportation Practice and the IBM Tradelens Sales Organization across EMEA. Core skills include business strategy development and execution, team leadership, and business development. 

Achievements include being accountable for gross profit, revenue, and signings, with a pipeline of over $1.6B in contract value and $370M in yearly revenue across Europe. I have set up the team and led the IBM Tradelens practice EMEA, established key client relationships with major companies in the travel industry, and led the business development of the Air France KLM enterprise Mobile Platform. I was an active member of the IATA steering committees and appointed as a member of the IBM Industry Academy representing Travel & Transportation.
profile_positions.title: Executive Director, Global Travel & Transportation Industries Leader Europe

profile_positions.description: As the VP of the Travel & Transportation Practice for EMEA at HP Enterprise, I led the practice and reported to the Senior VP and General Manager of HPE's Global Travel & Transportation Practice. I was responsible for driving new business growth across HP's service lines, with a yearly budget of $240M across EMEA and an additional $2.5M for product development. I managed a pipeline of over $1.4B and key accounts including Maersk, Lufthansa, DHL, Emirates, and more. I successfully led the practice re-organization and transformation process, introducing new advisory roles and segments. I also introduced the eAWB Freight Forwarder Portal and oversaw the IATA relationship relating to CASS. I had a strong track record of fostering partnerships with startups to improve on board aircraft connectivity. My core skills included P&L management, business development, sales, consulting, and team management.
profile_positions.title: Travel & Transportation Leader Industry Solutions EMEA

profile_positions.description:
I led Accenture's Freight & Logistics Software (AFLS) practice across EMEA, with the primary responsibility of driving business growth and expanding the company's presence throughout the region. As the lead, I was accountable for meeting yearly growth targets and responsible for developing the regional sales pipeline. Additionally, I managed a team for business development, pre-sales, and business services.

Reporting directly to the Managing Director, I achieved a significant milestone by closing a new business deal with a global ocean carrier (Maersk) within the first 9 months of my appointment. This success served as a strong foundation for other impactful achievements, including developing a robust sales pipeline that secured new business with accounts such as Air Bridge Cargo, Cargolux, Oman Air, Lufthansa Cargo, Saudi Airlines Cargo, Swissport, and DHL in the region.

Apart from driving business growth, I also played an active role in IATA's e-Cargo initiative, representing Accenture in the working groups. I also continued to expand the EMEA sales pipeline, securing new business in the region with accounts such as Oman Air, Lufthansa, and Saudi Airlines.
profile_positions.title: Director of Sales Freight & Logistics Software EMEA

profile_positions.description: Vayant is an independent B2B airfare shopping provider for airlines, online travel agencies, tour operators, and metasearch engines. The company is fast establishing itself as the go-to-provider of worldwide airfare shopping delivering fast and accurate results at a fraction of the cost.
profile_positions.title: Director of Global Sales

profile_positions.description:
Reporting to the Executive Vice President Worldwide Sales was my direct report, and I had P&L responsibility across the EMEA region. My core skills included leadership, strategic thinking, and business development.

My primary objective was to establish and grow Mxi's commercial organization in EMEA to serve aviation Engineering & Maintenance, Cargo and MRO organizations and increase revenue. To achieve this, I oversaw the EMEA practice and drove business growth with a yearly Gross Margin of over 40%.

I personally closed US$16 million worth of services and licenses and led the team in closing deals totaling US$27 million over the same period. I managed top tier key accounts across EMEA, including Air France KLM, Icelandair, BAE Systems, and IRKUT, averaging a quota of 140%, with the highest quota achieved of 176%.

One of my significant achievements was leading the successful completion of the $27M Air France KLM Royal Dutch Airlines Engineering & Maintenance ERP system implementation program across the entire fleet as Program Director at Mxi Technologies. Additionally, I was appointed as a member of the Air France KLM E&M Program Board from 2007-2011.

I set up and led a team of 18, with 6 direct reports consisting of 3 Sales Directors and 3 Project Managers, as well as Solution Architects and Analysts.
profile_positions.title: Director, Sales & Business Development EMEA
Program Director, Air France KLM Royal Dutch Airlines
